website_summaries.verdict: This is one of the more expensive sets. It appears to hold up well over time if you avoid putting it in the dryer.
pros: Stands out for its super-soft material
The quilt is made from durable 100% cotton and is fully reversible
cons: This set tends to shrink after the first wash, especially when placed in the dryer

customer_reviews.title: Did not survive two washes
customer_reviews.text: While I love the design and more "authentic" quilt feel, just after 2 washes per the directions on the tag, the quilt started falling apart. It's just me and 1 small dog in my house so it hasn't been roughed up, it only goes on one bed. I first noticed the unravelling of the stitching after the second wash, about 2 months after purchase. Loved it to start out with but sad about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, nice print, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, middle-weight quilt. I love that it came with the shams for the price, but be warned! The shams are for King Size Pillows! For some reason, I thought that it said regular pillows. So, had to buy a pair of cheapie pillows to fill them. Not a big deal. The quilt hangs below our tall, pillow-top mattress by about 4 inches or so. It might show a box spring on some beds, but we don't have a box spring, so it looks great on our platform bed. Didn't come wrinkled, so I didn't even have to iron. Love that!
customer_reviews.author: J. BurnettTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this quilt! The pattern is beautiful! I'm using it in our bedroom for summer. The pattern is tropical, but subtle, and the weight of the quilt is perfect for summer bedding!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Shrinky Dink
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! The all cotton quilt is not made of preshrunken material, which they don't mention in the description. The importance of which is that when you wash it, even in cold water, as I did, it shrinks to the size of a queen bedspread. Unfortunately, I have a king bed and I ordered a king size quilt. I would order a California King to replace it, however, one is not offered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving the TB stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We recently switched to a Q size and have been purchasing new bedding. The Tommy Bahama stuff has been the deepest so far and fits the best around the pillow top. They are nice quality sheets and this bedspread I actually purchased in a King size for the Q size bed. I'm glad I did because it wound up giving us plenty of room on each side as well as the bottom. We like to sleep a little cooler at night and this quilt is perfect. It's cotton so it's let's us breathe instead of holding all the body heat in, yet it provides weight an snuggly-ness (yes that's a word I just made it up).
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The print is the same front and back. I'm very happy with the quality and I love the way the quilt looks. The only "weird" thing I noticed is that the tags are sewn at the top of the quilt unless you want to sleep with your map upside down. I would rather have them sewn onto the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Well made from soft breathable cotton with crisp, clear images - I bought this as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves it. As someone who is always warm when sleeping I found it to be very comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not superior quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the pattern, shams are thin feel cheap. Kind of expected higher quality with designer label.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: The old world map is very colorful and very cool.
customer_reviews.text: I have this bedspread on my queen sized bed. The matching pillow shams loo nice as well. My wife found an old world map in a frame that we hung above my headboard. It all creates a great visual in my bedroom. (As long as the map doesn't come off the wall and crush my skull.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: They aren't cheap, but they are absolutely beautiful. I love mine & would gladly pay the price again. Outstanding attention to detail & amazing product & company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Masculine look and interesting map.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Dads bedroom. He likes looking at the map. He thinks it looks masculine. It fit well with a generous drop on the sides. He is happy so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborahonthebeach

customer_reviews.title: It covers the bed and hangs down below the mattress and is just a great spread. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: its refreshing to get an item that is called a "king size" and it actually is. It covers the bed and hangs down below the mattress and is just a great spread. I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: I needed a Queen, got a twin
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great price, if I'd been sent a queen. Im going to have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Paul's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Creates comfortable atmosphere.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Perfect for summer. I was trying to think of a summer theme for my bedroom, without being too feminine for my husband's taste. We love the Caribbean Islands, so this set reminds us of our many wonderful memories every time we lay on it. Completely relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: PATTY

customer_reviews.title: Love the print!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the bed of wrapping up in when on the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: like it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and very comfortable. Not a super heavy quilt but it's perfect for 60 degree nights!
customer_reviews.author: lp8400

customer_reviews.title: Map Love without the "ouch!"
customer_reviews.text: We are map fanatics, so when I saw this bargain I ordered it to go with our new mattress. I would NOT have purchased it if the cover, front and back, was not 100% cotton. We live in the high static environment of the high desert, so artificial fabrics are extremely zappy!
customer_reviews.author: Spud's PlaceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: summer change
customer_reviews.text: Well made product with nice design and style. Just the perfect item to change out the down comforter for the summer. Check pricing everywhere though; Amazon was not the best deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail H. Gutterman

customer_reviews.title: Quality at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this quilt! The design and colors are perfect for my bedroom. I like the fact that it is lightweight and the pattern is on both sides. The shams fit my standard pillows quite well and the quilt is big enough that there is adequate drop on the sides and bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader in Palm Springs

customer_reviews.title: Love It.
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these. I love the print, not too heavy for summer sleeping, looks very nice. Wish it was just a wee bit larger for a king size bed. Other than that, easy care!
customer_reviews.author: Chrise

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight makes it easy to make bed
customer_reviews.text: We liked the pattern because my daughter sailed the Caribbean
customer_reviews.author: James J Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the design and worked perfectly in the guest room
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design and worked perfectly in the guest room. However, after first wash it drastically shrunk. It now doesn’t fit the bed it is for AND it is horribly rough textured. I’m extremely bummed I spent so much money on it and now I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: ross w.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for b-day
customer_reviews.text: My son love it! It was a gift for his b-day
customer_reviews.author: Olesya

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty on the bed
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty on the bed. Perfect match for what I was looking for. Light weight but keeps you very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great texture and weight but does not have as much "hangover" as I would have liked making it a little short in length and width for my king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Beware......
customer_reviews.text: This set came with miss matched pillow shams! Grrrrrr! I didn't realize this until I washed them! Grrrrr! Now I am stuck with this,,,see photo.
customer_reviews.author: nancy mau

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't quite feel like a quilt
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I expected,It doesn't quite feel like a quilt, feels more like a very large cloth place-mat. Doesn't have the comfy feel of a quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ou

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well made. A little short on the sides for a king, but I have come to expect that with any quilt. It washed beautifully. The only problem was that the shams were not pattern matched. This is generally not a problem for most people though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOW OFFER PRICE.
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD PRODUCT FOR A LOW OFFER PRICE. MUY BUEN PRODUCTO PARA UN PRECIO DE OFERTA BAJO.
customer_reviews.author: William Faria

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach setting!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive...not the quality of the Sferra line for Tommy Bahama but then the price point isn't either. I am very very pleased with this purchase and it looks great in my beach guest room!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Anne

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Travel Theme Room
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a quilt that would fit my "Cruise Room" Caribbean theme. This is really good quality. The design is subtle and suitable to a soothing color scheme. The shams are a bonus since they are the same fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Love this quilt!
customer_reviews.text: Love this quilt! I got it because I sleep hot and needed something for summer. It has a nice weight to it, but not heavy. Perfectly fits my king bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amarcus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with this purchase... looks great and it is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: nivek

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quilt. Very soft. I washed this quilt using provided instructions and it shrank. Only negative to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zorro$$$$

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love my new spread. It is lightweight and just right for the summer weather when AC is running. Time will tell of course and when it is washed the first time. But it completes my bedroom! I did expect it to be whiter than it was. Pix online looks white but it is beige. Still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo

customer_reviews.title: Loves wonderful...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our vacation rental. Customer seem to like it - it looks nice, lightweight but keeps you warm when needed on those chilly nights but not to hot on the warm ones.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Good quilt.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a guest bedroom with a beach theme.and neutral decor. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the spread and it is just right weight for the summer with the ac on.
customer_reviews.author: njsue

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for my son's room. Fabric is great and washes perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lipstickgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Tommy Bahama fan and this set is a great value and looks spectacular if you make your bed regularly.
customer_reviews.author: SanibelW

customer_reviews.title: Light-medium weight, looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: There is no batting to this quilt, but it is of a good thickness considering that. It is comfortable and seems like it will be durable through many washings.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Made sturdy and is nicely oversized. Neutral and very nice for a guest room
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a perfect fit for my grandsons explorer bedroom. Met all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i recommend this to everyone...the quilt was exactly what i was expecting. it came fast and has really been a nice addition to room.
customer_reviews.author: William Perez

customer_reviews.title: Tommy Bahama Quilt Set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my guest bedroom and absolutely love it! The neutral colors are great and would go with about anything. I like the fact that it is not real heavy and will get more use than a comforter. Love it, and will be looking for a King Set soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my husband and he really likes it. It's a perfect weight and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wayman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This quilt looks great and I am extremely happy. I like that a dust ruffle/skirt isn't necessary to enhance this look.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it...but they should prewash because they do shrink. I bought a king for a queen.
customer_reviews.author: lisa swann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Fits perfect. Would buy it again !
customer_reviews.author: Marion Ganz

customer_reviews.title: lays very nicely. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations. Not stiff or overly puffy, lays very nicely. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ro-Living

customer_reviews.title: but I put a heavy comforter under it and it looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up loving it. At first I thought it was to light a weight for what I wanted, but I put a heavy comforter under it and it looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured, good quality, great value for designer home goods.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Marie Schall

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GREAT GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, great quality and great price. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Cal King and it is very nice. Haven't really broke it in yet (only twice washed) but I am sure it will be comfy for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: elJuez

customer_reviews.title: Kid-friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product for kid's room. Easy to wash and dry. Easy to combine with other sheet colors.
customer_reviews.author: AmMS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for several months until I stumbled into this one. I have a King bed and got the King size and it fits great. I'm very pleased with the color and quality. Glad I bought it! Love that it's reversible too
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Barrett

customer_reviews.title: A little better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bedding for a little over a month now. It's holding up well and it a nice weight. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: edistojess

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, would have liked if pillow shams were available
customer_reviews.author: francis hecox

customer_reviews.title: Tommy Bahama quilt
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Washed it & the fabric came out soft and comfy, but it only comes down to cover the edges ov the pillowtop mattress, not down to the bottom of the box springs like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Love It. Nice weight colors and sizes
customer_reviews.text: Love It. Nice weight colors and sizes. Put in spare bedroom with traveling theme.
customer_reviews.author: Peg Zimmer

customer_reviews.title: It is not a global map.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the map is of the Caribbean it looks great in my African inspired guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Sheron Ward

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For the price and for such a known brand, I'm terribly disappointed. Material is stiff and *scratchy*. I've washed it twice in hopes of making it softer. No dice. It's awful. Definitely the last thing you'd want on your bed, unless you enjoy sleeping on hay.
customer_reviews.author: Sam c

customer_reviews.title: Really liked the lightweight quilt very much
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the lightweight quilt very much. Be careful placing the item in the dryer after washing as it will shrink. All in all, a nice purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Tommy Bahama Quilt
customer_reviews.text: The colors of the quilt were drabber in person than in the picture. Also the material was rough and had a cheap feel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Kazmierski

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this quilt set. Very vintage but also really classy. The colors go with my room-So my style.
customer_reviews.author: thegreek1

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: awesome love it, great job TB, looks great and just gets better after each wash, looking for more product coming thanks
customer_reviews.author: William E O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Tommy Bahama always pleases!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I definitely chose the wrong bedspread for my wall color I have to give kudos to Tommy Bahamas brand and quality of bed cover it is just as described and my husband is a great fan of their shirts for obvious reasons so you can trust the quality of the bedspread. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it seemed too hard to return and it wasn't matchable with my walls but that actually is not the bedspreads fault ...it's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: bob pletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great summer bedspread
customer_reviews.text: This worked out perfectly. It was exactly as described. I would highly recommend this. You will not be dissapointed at all!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: USED AS COVER FOR MY BEAUTIFUL NEW LEATHER CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: SO PRETTY LIGHT & YET STRONG....LOVELY QUILT....SO GLAD I BOUGHT YOU. YOU BRING THE WORLD TO MY SOCIAL LIFE....MATCHES EVERYTHING!!!
customer_reviews.author: LIZ VIN

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and small tears
customer_reviews.text: It was smelly and found a couple of small tears... Kept it anyway because it looks nice and didn't want to deal with a return process.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This Map Quilt is soooo thin and lack of cotton that it will not even stay on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Caribbean map print is neutral, subtle and soothing. The colors are beiges, browns, a range of grays. The grays are in the blue gray family. There is no red, yellow, green, or blue. Nicely made. Fabric is a nice cotton with cotton quilting.
customer_reviews.author: Gellie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this quilt
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is obsessed with maps. This is the perfect quilt for him. He was SO happy with it. The muted colors look great in his room. We like that it is cotton and thinner and lightweight because we live in Florida. When it arrived it was somewhat stiff, which is common in packaging to make things appear to look "perfect." I am happy to report after one washing and drying in hot dryer that it is very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mreid5151

customer_reviews.title: Product shrunk more than usual
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this product. I washed it in hot water and it shrunk up so much that it's almost too small for my queen size bed. I've used quilts for years on my beds and regularly laundered them in hot water and I've never had a one shrink so much. After one month of use the seam on one of the corners has also split apart. Dud of a product. Needless to say I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Spann612

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but short sided for my Queen
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice but if you have a queen I would order the king size. 90" x 90" did not work well for my mattress. But mattresses really vary in height (mine is mid sized). Otherwise good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this bedspread. It is very well made with good quality material. I ordered a king size for my queen bed so the sides will be longer and this fits beautifully and the sides hang down to the floor to cover the mattress. The pattern is really nice for our bed at our cottage and the weight is perfect for those cooler summer nights up north . I would definitely recommend this purchase. The price was reasonable and I am extremely pleased with it. I used the pillow shams for a cover over a small dresser instead of for the pillows and it looks wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Goes great in our master bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Goes great in our master bedroom. I wasn't sure if it would be too monotone, but there is enough shade variation to not be "blah". Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: pleahy

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I both love this unique pattern quilt! It fits our king bed with a standard thickness mattress just as the picture shows with plenty of fabric on the sides. The weight of it is perfect for our summers here in Florida. The pattern is neither too feminine or masculine. We would recommend to anyone looking for something with a twist of the Caribbean flavor as it shows Florida, the Bahamas, the Caribbean, Cuba, etc. in the repeated map print. As always, Amazon delivered yet another product right on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lehigh Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Tommy Bahama
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the photo. Beautiful. Tans and beige with a hint of a medium blue. Haven't washed it yet so can't say how well it will do after that.
customer_reviews.author: CCCC1216

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not real colorful but has old map feel a& look. Fun & interesting.
customer_reviews.author: J. koval

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my guest bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my guest bedroom, it makes you wish you were in the Caribbean with a drink with an umbrella in it. Perfect if you want to have brown, tan & beige tones in your room. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LongBeachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern on this. Purchases a queen and sides hang almost halfway down. Order a king if you want to hang further. Not real heavy but I don't mind as it will be much easier to wash. I added another blanket underneath for the cold winter months.
customer_reviews.author: M.Reader

customer_reviews.title: I washed it in my extra large heavy duty commercial washer and it did great!
customer_reviews.text: It is just as pictured! It is a lightweight quilt and fits the Queen bed perfectly! I washed it in my extra large heavy duty commercial washer and it did great!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!  Doesn't work on queen size nice mattresses which are thicker.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Map quilt set, just not crazy about the size. I have a queen size, semi-thick, mattress and this is too short on the sides. I didn't notice the queen measurement, it appears the bedding industry hasn't kept up with the newer thicker mattresses like the sheets have done. It's cute but it doesn't fit well.
customer_reviews.author: R.W. Hamlett, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quilt ... Definitely the look we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the quilt however, I thought the weigh would be a bit more significant.
customer_reviews.author: Ferm

customer_reviews.title: Very neutral colors, and obviously all cotton. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Very neutral colors, and obviously all cotton. It is a little stiff but I am sure it will soften up with washing. It does fit a King bed but not a lot of room to spare on the drop. If it shrinks it will be too small.
customer_reviews.author: Sherala

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty Quilt at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for snuggling under on a warm night, Cool comfy cotton. Pretty beige and brown, very neutral and tropical, gives the ambiance of antique Carribbean bungalow bedroom. Beautifully made, nice shams too. Arrived very promptly, nice packaging. I will keep this for myself to take on our boat when we sail the Bahamas!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 21 year old grandson was re-doing his bedroom & I wanted to get his quilt set. I searched for MONTHS & just could not find the right thing. I found many attractive sets that were suitable for others, but just not the perfect set until I found this. It is absolutely perfect for a single young man. The colors being such that you can blend in whatever other shades you might want. I love it & my grandson does to!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: VERY pretty - looks great in our guest room
customer_reviews.text: VERY pretty - looks great in our guest room. Originally bought it for us to use in our bedroom but the quilt wasn't at all plush, so we switched it out with the guest room.
customer_reviews.author: scouzo

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, perfect for a beach house
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, perfect for a beach house. Great for a men's room as it has the brown colors. The material is thin but heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S

customer_reviews.title: love love love it
customer_reviews.text: cant say how much i love this quilt, i use it all year long and it works as good as it looks. it could be a little wider but that is my only issue with it i will but again from this seller as it arrived before the time they told me!
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Carribean Cool!
customer_reviews.text: More for a full size bed. Not big enough for a queen but we kept it because we like it so much. I ordered it for our master bedroom but decided it was more for a guest room. Coverlet is very thin. Not thick as the picture would lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Laurene Creekbaum

customer_reviews.title: Nice TB Quilt
customer_reviews.text: We like our new quilt. I washed/machine dried it and can tell there was some shrinking, but the fabric & stitching held up great. Next time I wash it I will line dry it. I love the antique map print, but would love a combination of more island choices. The shams are an added bonus. Although this is reversible it's the same print on the other side. Would have been fun to have other islands on the reverse. We'll enjoy for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: I really like this quilt
customer_reviews.text: I really like this quilt. It is lightweight which is what I wanted as we live in Fl. Purchased the king and it fit perfectly on the king bed. Also print is perfect for Florida décor. Have not laundered as of this date, but material seems like it would stand up well.
customer_reviews.author: beach granny

customer_reviews.title: King size for our Queen deep mattress, perfect fit. It's a thin, light quilt
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the King size for our Queen deep mattress, perfect fit. It's a thin, light quilt which is perfect for Florida most of the year. Washed and dried it twice so far..not too much shrinkage and still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: I love this quilt
customer_reviews.text: I love this quilt! It goes very well in my bedroom and is very easy to care for. I wanted a lighter weight spread and this one delivers. The full/queen size covers my extra thick mattress perfectly and it does not shrink after washing. Just right! I would definitely recommend this quilt to others.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Corr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Looks wonderful in my room, not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What A Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product for the price! I love Tommy Bahama and this went perfect with the TB bedroom set I have. It fits great , covers well all around on my king size bed. A much better price than department stores.
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great print & material was soft ... just too pricey for what you get in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: I love the print & the thickness of the set. I took 2 stars off because it is over priced in my opinion & it did have some snagged threads which became worse once I washed the quilt.
customer_reviews.author: Madskul

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't really feel like a quilt
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't quite look right on my king-size bed. It doesn't really feel like a quilt.

product_meta.title: Tommy Bahama Map Quilt Set, Queen, Khaki
